unnormalised: Gurgaon property prices are soaring! A new luxury apartment complex at 123, Golf Course Road, Sector 42, Gurgaon, Haryana 122002, is now listed at an average of Rs. 2.5 crores per unit. Experts attribute this rise to increased demand and limited supply of premium housing.
normalised: Gurgaon property prices are soaring! A new luxury apartment complex at one hundred and twenty three, Golf Course Road, Sector forty two, Gurgaon, Haryana one hundred and twenty two thousand and two, is now listed at an average of rupees two point five crores per unit. Experts attribute this rise to increased demand and limited supply of premium housing.

unnormalised: The project, developed by ABC Builders, boasts amenities like a swimming pool, gym, and 24/7 security. Units range from 2200 sq ft to 3500 sq ft. Interested buyers can visit the sales office at the same address: 123, Golf Course Road, Sector 42, Gurgaon, Haryana 122002, or contact them at +91-9876543210.
normalised: The project, developed by A-B-C Builders, boasts amenities like a swimming pool, gym, and twenty four seven security. Units range from two thousand two hundred square feet to three thousand five hundred square feet. Interested buyers can visit the sales office at the same address: one hundred and twenty three, Golf Course Road, Sector forty two, Gurgaon, Haryana one hundred and twenty two thousand and two, or contact them at plus ninety one dash nine eight seven six five four three two one zero.

unnormalised: Analysts advise prospective buyers to carefully evaluate their financial situation before investing. Remember to factor in stamp duty and registration charges, typically around 5-7% of the property value. Consult with a real estate agent to understand local market trends and ensure a smooth transaction.
normalised: Analysts advise prospective buyers to carefully evaluate their financial situation before investing. Remember to factor in stamp duty and registration charges, typically around five to seven percent of the property value. Consult with a real estate agent to understand local market trends and ensure a smooth transaction.

unnormalised: It is also important to verify all property documents and approvals before making any payments. Check the builder's reputation and track record to avoid potential issues in the future. Property documents may also be requested at the property registration office located at Mini Secretariat, Sector 12, Gurugram, Haryana 122001.
